path.style: stroke-width: 10; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: miter; stroke: rgb(34, 34, 34); fill: rgb(34, 34, 34);
stroke-width: 16; stroke-linecap: butt; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(215, 74, 108); fill: none;
stroke-width: 16; stroke-linecap: square; stroke-linejoin: bevel; stroke: rgb(88, 163, 194); fill: none;
